import React from "react"; const ProfListItem = ({prof={ "firstName": "Martin", "lastName": "Shi", "handle": "Code Elite", "profilePicture": "../../../../tuiter/martin.jpg", "bannerPicture": "../../../../tuiter/interstellar.jpg", "bio": "Student, Data Scientist, Algorithm Engineer", "website": "youtube.com/webdevtv", "location": "Boston, MA", "dateOfBirth": "3/1998", "dateJoined": "12/2020", "followingCount": 312, "followersCount": 180 }})=> { return (
{prof.lastName} {prof.firstName}
{prof.handle}
{prof.bio}
{prof.location} Born {prof.dateOfBirth} Joined {prof.dateJoined}
{prof.followersCount}



); } export default ProfListItem;
